archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Product Owner, for post paid and subscription payments; the valid methods of payment are as follows: Direct debit, Credit card, Direct credit, Internet banking, NZ post, Vodafone stores, IVR so that we are driving customers to a digital experience

properties.value: Integrations required. Do we need different types of payments, are there accounted in the same way? Batch payment types: - internet banking - (push) payment to bank that is verified using logs from the bank (for subscription model?) - direct debit (pull) - reccuring from the credit card (batch)(pull), (Windcave, Payment Express , They used to be known as DPS) - file from the NZ post - file from the stores (pronto, currently by file) - ivr payments by windcave + eShop, CRM Postpaid model payment methods - all mentioned, Subscription model payment methods - Credit/Debit card, Direct debit. Internet banking has to be confirmed by VFNZ
